issue.title: [C++] Fix documentation of Reading CSV files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9277](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9277). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I gave C++ API a try and copy-pasted [the basic usage of Reading CSV files](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/csv.html?highlight=csv%20c#basic-usage) but the snippet did not work for me.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9277?focusedCommentId=17148735) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7590
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7590>
